page.title: 03MORDIFORD SERVICES
page.content: {Pubs and Hotels -}As well as beer etc. The Half Moon at Mordiford offers a dartboard, quoits and crib and sell hot meals and snacks. Their busiest time is between Whitsun_October. Longworth Hall Hotel is residential but has a bar open to non-residents and caters for wedding receptions. Its busiest seasons are Whitsun_October and the Christmas period. {Specialised Services}There are kennels at Longworth Hall which house dogs and cats.A school library service is based in Hereford and regularly visits Mordiford school. A blacksmith based at Whitestone, Hereford visits local farms on a regular basis. {Post Office/General Stores -}There are two within the D_block. Checkley stocks most low order convenience goods but in addition Mordiford serves as the local newsagent.
